author: jeremias
msg: Improve breaking for block-container and static-content so there are no more "breaking artifacts" (like additional border lines) in the overflowing part of the content anymore. This is done by removing all breaks from the result list prior to constructing the area tree. The presence of breaks simply indicates that there is an overflow.
